rules.description: Post escape if caps is pressed alone, left_ctrl otherwise
Post left_ctrl when return_or_enter is hold.
Xcode Visual Studio style (Run, Stop, Build, Step, Breakpoint)
CAPS to hyper/left_control or escape if pressed alone
Post right_control when return_or_enter is hold
Single hand nav: n + [hjkl] [gb,.] [we] for navigation
Home row nav: f + [hjkl] [gb,.] [we] for navigation
